channel.title: CVE Feed for CleverSoft -- Clever Addons for Elementor
channel.description: The latest CVEs for CleverSoft -- Clever Addons for Elementor

item.title: CVE-2021-24273|2024-08-03T19:28:22.714Z -- cleversoft -- clever%20addons%20for%20elementor
item.description: The “Clever Addons for Elementor” WordPress Plugin before 2.1.0 has several widgets that are vulnerable to stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) by lower-privileged users such as contributors, all via a similar method.
